sentences.en: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.cn: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

sentences.en: Astronomers will have to collect more spectra from these stars to confirm their suspicions.
sentences.cn: 天文学家们必须要从这些恒星上采集更多的光谱来证实他们的推想。

sentences.en: Can you confirm this?
sentences.cn: 这个你能确定吗？

sentences.en: Could you confirm the dates we discussed?
sentences.cn: 你能确认我们商讨过的日期吗？

sentences.en: Earlier reports were unable to confirm that there were any survivors.
sentences.cn: 早先的报道无法证实是否有幸存者。

sentences.en: Further scans are required to confirm the diagnosis of an abnormality.
sentences.cn: 需要进一步扫描来确诊是否出现异常病变。

sentences.en: Further to our letter of February 5 th, we can now confirm that all the spare parts you requested are available.
sentences.cn: 为了对我们二月五号那封信作进一步的说明, 我们现在可以保证你们所要的零件都有现货.

sentences.en: His new role could confirm him as one of our leading actors.
sentences.cn: 他的新角色会确保他跻身我们的一流演员之列。

sentences.en: If he funks it, he will confirm the impression of cowardice given by his recent letter.
sentences.cn: 如果他对此畏缩，那就会证实他在最近一封信里表现出来的怯懦。

sentences.en: New evidence has confirmed the first witness’s story.
sentences.cn: 新的证据证实了第一个证人的说法。

sentences.en: Note the rising tone in the tag questions to confirm intonation.
sentences.cn: 注意标签问题里确定语调的声调.

sentences.en: Please confirm your acceptance of this offer in writing.
sentences.cn: 请书面确认你接受这项提议。

sentences.en: Recent medical studies confirm the efficacy of a healthier lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 最新医学研究证实了较为健康的生活方式的好处。

sentences.en: Smith was confirmed as the club’s new manager yesterday.
sentences.cn: 史密斯昨天已被确定为俱乐部新任主教练。

sentences.en: The tissue is examined microscopically to rule out or confirm cancer.
sentences.cn: 利用显微镜检查组织，以排除或确认癌变。

sentences.en: These new statistics confirm our worst fears about the depth of the recession.
sentences.cn: 这些新的统计数据证实经济衰退已经严重到我们最为担忧的境地。

sentences.en: To confirm my diagnosis I need to do some tests.
sentences.cn: 为了证实我的诊断，我要做一些化验。

sentences.en: We will always confirm the revised amount to you in writing before debiting your account.
sentences.cn: 在记入您账户的借方之前，我们总是会就发生变动的数额书面通知您。

sentences.en: When do you think the president will confirm you in office?
sentences.cn: 你认为总统将在什么时候批准你任职?

sentences.en: X-rays have confirmed that he has not broken any bones.
sentences.cn: X光片已经证实他没有骨折。

sentences.en: You make the reservation, and I'll confirm it in writing.
sentences.cn: 你来预订，我会去函确认。

words.tran_cn: 确认的；保兑的；坚定的；惯常的
确证；使坚定（confirm的过去分词）；批准

trans.tran_cn: 证实，确认，使感觉更强烈，使确信，批准，受坚信礼，使坚定
trans.tran_en: to show that something is definitely true, especially by providing more proof

trans.tran_cn: 证实， 肯定； 进一步确定， 确认； 批准； 加强， 坚定
trans.tran_en: to show that something is definitely true, especially by providing more proof
